title: Barnwell on two knee injuries with big implications: What now for the Packers, Chiefs?

title: Source: Pack get good news on Watson's injury

title: Jets fire DC Wilks after blowout loss to Jaguars
content: The New York Jets have fired defensive coordinator Steve Wilks and have turned playcalling over to interim DC Chris Harris, who has served as the passing game coordinator.

title: Big Ten boasts 10 first-team AP All-Americans
content: Four players from Ohio State are among 10 first-team picks from the Big Ten on the Associated Press All-America team released Monday.

title: Sources: NBA Cup may leave Vegas next season
content: After three seasons, the NBA is considering moving the location of the NBA Cup away from Las Vegas next season, sources told ESPN.

title: Simmons' home burglarized during Titans' game
content: Titans defensive tackle Jeffery Simmons' home was broken into while the team was in Santa Clara, California, to face the 49ers on Sunday.

title: Gators QB Lagway opts to enter transfer portal
content: Florida sophomore quarterback DJ Lagway, who had 16 touchdown passes and 14 interceptions last season, announced that he is entering the transfer portal.

content: The train will halt at Bhimavaram Town, Gudivada, Vijayawada, Tenali, Ongole, Nellore and Renigunta before reaching MGR Chennai Central station

title: Air India CEO apologises to Congress MP
content: Senior Congress leader K.C. Venugopal moved a privilege motion against the Air India CEO Campbell Wilson in connection with a flight the former took in August

title: Watch: Senior Congress Leader Shamanur Shivashankarappa Passes Away

content: A total of 34 MLAs, including some belonging to the Kuki community, took part in the meeting on Sunday

title: SHANTI Bill spurs private sector to make, run nuclear plants
content: The SHANTI Bill penalises operators in case of a nuclear accident, requiring them to compensate on the basis of the the size of plants operated and not the damage experienced in itself

title: Watch: Lionel Messi ends G.O.A.T. India Tour with grand Delhi finale
content: Lionel Messi brought his much-anticipated G.O.A.T. India Tour to a spectacular close in Delhi, thrilling thousands of fans after a chaotic start in Kolkata on December 13.

title: PM Modi and Jordan‚Äôs King discuss bilateral ties, exchange perspectives on regional and global issues
content: The full-fledged bilateral visit to Jordan is taking place after 37 years, coinciding with the 75th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations between the two countries

title: Calcutta HC to hear PILs on violence at Messi event; five spectators held
content: Petitioners have sought the court‚Äôs intervention in transferring the probe from the West Bengal Police to Central investigating agencies

title: Government proposes to send VBSA Bill to JPC
content: The Bill seeks to subsume the UGC, AICTE, NCTE, and separate funding from the regulatory body; the Opposition has slammed the Bill as an ‚Äúattack on federalism‚Äù

title: Unemployment rate falls to 4.7% in November, lowest since April: Government survey
content: The PLFS stated that the overall Labour Force Participation Rate increased to 55.8% in November, the highest level recorded since April.

title: In Kerala, Modi government favouring Adani group in highway road projects: Venugopal
content: Claiming a ‚Äúhighway scam‚Äù, the Congress MP says that from Kasaragod in the north to Kollam in the south, National Highway projects, two major stretches NH 66 and NH 544, are collapsing before the eyes of the public

content: Joseph says that the move not only disrespects Gandhi‚Äôs contributions but also risks destabilising a vital employment guarantee programme that has been crucial for rural livelihoods since its inception in 2005.

title: Beypore gears up for water fest
content: Contestants from five countries are expected to take part in the kite festival, one of the major attractions of water fest; cycle rally from Kozhikode to Beypore on December 25 to herald the start of the festival

title: Nadda appoints Sanjay Saraogi as new Bihar BJP president
content: The 56-year-old leader is five times MLA hails from the Vaishya community, which is the core voter of the party. He earlier served as the coordinator of the Bihar State BJP Cow Protection Cell.

title: Attracting younger audiences to classical music concerts is a challenge, says A.R. Rahman
content: The Oscar-winning music director inaugurates the 99th annual music conference and concerts of the Music Academy; presents the M.S. Subbulakshmi Award and the cash prize instituted by The Hindu to violinist R.K. Shriramkumar, the Sangita Kalanidhi designate for 2025

title: District court grants bail to YouTuber Rahul Easwar in survivor intimidation case
content: On his release, Rahul Easwar alleged a conspiracy at¬†Chief Minister Pinarayi Vijayan‚Äôs level to silence him by incarcerating him during the politically sensitive campaign phase of the local body elections in Kerala¬†

title: IFFK 2025: Anti-ageism film Blue Trail portrays the joy of discovering the new at old age
content: Brazilian filmmaker Gabriel Mascaro‚Äôs Blue Trail  follows a senior citizen‚Äôs determination to pursue her dream even as an all-powerful government tries to put her away in a colony meant for those above 80.

content: ‚ÄúThe affidavit blamed local and police administrations, while the Court did not want to treat the case suo motu as an adverse litigation, but only wanted solutions to the problem,‚Äù says Justice Maheshwari

title: BJP MPs force adjournment in both Houses of Parliament over alleged threat to Modi
content: The ruling party members say the slogan ‚ÄòModi‚Äôs grave will be dug, if not today, then tomorrow‚Äô was raised in the Congress rally against ‚Äòvote theft‚Äô on Sunday. Alleging that it was a threat to the Prime Minister‚Äôs life, they demand the Opposition party tender an apology.

title: Karnataka govt. to revive probe into Chilume Trust case amid allegations of widespread voter fraud
content: The State government has appointed senior advocate Prof. Ravi Verma Kumar to represent the State in a writ petition before the High Court

title: S.P. Balasubrahmanyam‚Äôs statue unveiled at Ravindra Bharathi in Hyderabad
content: Minister Sridhar Babu says legendary playback singer, who rendered more than 40,000 songs in 14 Indian languages, had left an indelible mark on the history of film music

title: Juvvaladinne to be developed as tourist destination, says Minister
content: Ministers Dr. Ponguru Narayana and Dr. Dola Sree Bala Veeranjaneya Swamy pay tributes to Potti Sriramulu on his 73rd death anniversary celebrations in Nellore and Prakasam districts respectively

title: TTD to introduce QR codes, kiosks in its temples
content: The initiative will enable devotees to make offerings and payments in a hassle-free manner, in line with modern digital practices, says EO

title: NIA charges four LeT-TRF terrorists, two locals in Pahalgam terror attack; conspiracy traced to Pakistan‚Äã‚Äã
content: The 1,597-page¬†chargesheet submitted to a special court named three Pakistani terrorists killed by Indian security forces during the action in Operation Mahadev at Dachigam, Srinagar in July 2025

content: They say the memorandums submitted to State ministers, seeking more charging points, have been ignored for more than six months

title: Winter comes calling early in Munnar, temperature drops to 3¬∞C
content: As per climate experts, Munnar is witnessing an early winter after 2018. Usually extreme cold is experienced in the hill station from the first week of January

content: Justice N. Anand Venkatesh calls for the explanation by January 6 in the ‚Çπ98.25 crore corporation contract irregularities case against former Minister S.P. Velumani

title: Private hospital penalised for collecting excess money from NTR Vaidya Seva beneficiary
content: District administration imposes a penalty three times the excess amount and directs the hospital to refund the collected sum to the patient

title: Palnadu car accident: action taken against SI for negligence of duty
content: The charges include failure to immediately inform superior officers about the accident, maintaining close associations with individuals involved in criminal activities and allegedly extending assistance to them

title: Vigil stepped up following tiger movement near Mediapalli opencast coal mine in Peddapalli district
content: Tiger is believed to have crossed over through Mancherial district from the Tadoba Andhari Tiger Reserve in Maharashtra‚Äôs Chandrapur district a few days ago

title: Detailed Project Report prepared for Thanjavur-Karaikal track doubling: Railway Minister
content: DMK Rajya Sabha member S. Kalyanasundaram recently raised a question in the House on the doubling of track on Thanjavur-Villupuram broad gauge section

title: RJD slams Nitish Kumar after video shows Bihar CM removing woman‚Äôs hijab
content: RJD posted the clip on X and asked whether Mr. Kumar‚Äôs ‚Äúmental state has now reached a completely pitiable condition, or has Nitish babu become 100% sanghi now?‚Äù

title: Regularisation of Sada Bainamas faces hurdles as officials insist on affidavits
content: Insistence on the affidavits from persons who sold the lands through sada bainamas by the officials concerned is said to be one of the major impediments in the regularisation process along with mismatch in the names in records too, say experts

title: BJP names Piyush Goyal in-charge of T.N. polls, Panda for Assam
content: Piyush Goyal has experience in handling the party‚Äôs affairs in Tamil Nadu having facilitated the BJP-AIADMK alliance before the 2019 elections

title: HC grants Rahul Mamkoothatil interim protection from arrest till Thursday
content: Government moves High Court challenging the anticipatory bail given to the Palakkad MLA in a second rape case. HC grants Mankootathil time to file objections against government plea

title: Rails users pitch for increasing frequency of trains to Kashi from T.N.
content: Varanasi Railway Division has proposed increasing the frequency of Banaras-Rameswaram-Banaras Express, a weekly service now, to a bi-weekly express

title: Nitin Nabin takes charge as BJP working president
content: His immediate challenges will be to face the Assembly elections due in West Bengal, Assam, Kerala, Tamil Nadu and Puducherry

title: Need seen for extensive use of AI to improve quality of education
content: Vice-Chairman of Karnataka State Higher Education Council S.R. Niranjana inaugurates responsible AI conference at Karnatak University in Dharwad

title: IFFK 2025: Fazil Razak‚Äôs Moham is an antidote to films celebrating toxicity
content: Moham, being screened in the Malayalam Cinema Today category at the 30th International Film Festival of Kerala, follows the intertwining lives of Amala, a woman grappling with mental health challenges, and Shanu, a man driven by revenge after a breakup due to his overbearing nature.

title: 2026 elections: UDF hints at keeping Sabarimala row at top of Opposition‚Äôs anti-govt. rhetoric
content: Congress leader Ramesh Chennithala hands in evidence to the SIT which points to a ‚Äúglobal conspiracy‚Äù involving international gangs which trade in revered objects looted from religious places of worship for sale to wealthy collectors

title: MLAs from Malnad, coastal regions raise areca issue in Assembly, seek relief for growers
content: The State Government, in its budget for the year 2025-26, has earmarked ‚Çπ62 crore for the management of the crop disease

title: After DKS remarks, BNP says apartment residents‚Äô anger stems from years of govt. inaction
content: After Deputy Chief Minister¬†D.K. Shivakumar said that there was no need to ‚Äòthreaten‚Äô him, the Bengaluru¬†NavaNirmana¬†Party said residents‚Äô anger was a natural outcome of years of government inaction on basic issues affecting people living in apartment complexes¬†

title: GBA targets vaccination of over 11.34 lakh children during pulse polio drive
content: The Greater Bengaluru Authority (GBA) has set a target of administering pulse polio drops to over 11.34 lakh children under the age of five during the National Pulse Polio Campaign scheduled from December 21 to 24, GBA Chief Commissioner M. Maheshwar Rao said ¬†

title: Homegrown hellfire: Used in Op Sindoor to crush Pak; why 'Hammer' deal matters
content: India's decision to manufacture the French HAMMER precision-guided weapon marks a strategic shift towards mastering modern air warfare technologies. This move from importing finished munitions to domestic production signifies a focus on accuracy, stand-off reach, and controlled escalation in future conflicts.

title: New Year's Eve terror plot: FBI foils major attack; 5 held for planning bombings
content: US federal authorities have arrested four individuals accused of plotting coordinated New Year's Eve bomb attacks across Southern California. The suspects, allegedly linked to the Turtle Island Liberation Front, were preparing to test improvised explosive devices in the desert. A fifth arrest was made in New Orleans in connection with a separate planned attack.

title: Delhi airport chaos: 228 flights cancelled amid dense fog; airlines issue advisory
content: Dense fog crippled Delhi's airport on Monday, leading to 228 flight cancellations and five diversions.  Visibility plummeted, impacting operations under CAT III conditions.  Authorities urged passengers to check flight status, prioritizing safety amidst the severe air quality and persistent smog.  Airlines also issued advisories, warning of schedule disruptions.

title: Sri Lanka to arrest 1996 World Cup-winning captain Arjuna Ranatunga
content: Sri Lankan authorities are planning to arrest former cricket captain Arjuna Ranatunga on corruption charges related to his time as petroleum minister. He and his brother are accused of altering oil procurement procedures, causing an estimated $5 million loss to the state. His brother has been arrested and released on bail, with a travel ban imposed.

title: Stolen childhoods: How fallout between two generals destroyed Sudan - explained
content: Sudan‚Äôs war erupted in April 2023 after a power struggle between rival generals Abdel Fattah al-Burhan and Mohamed Hamdan Dagalo collapsed into nationwide fighting. What began as elite infighting has become the world‚Äôs largest displacement crisis, devastating cities, services and livelihoods. Ethnic violence has returned to Darfur, while millions face famine, disease and forgotten suffering amid weak international response.

title: 25 years of 'cloud': Salesforce CEO says it's over: Company may rename itself
content: Salesforce CEO Marc Benioff has ditched the word "cloud," a significant shift for the tech pioneer. Focus groups revealed customers now prioritize discussing AI agents over cloud technology. This pivot is underscored by renaming products to "Agentforce" and a massive bet on AI, evidenced by layoffs and substantial deal closures, aiming for $60 billion in revenue by 2030.

title: Rob Reiner killed: Trump posts shocking rant; 'he drove people crazy'
content: Hollywood director Rob Reiner and his wife Michele Singer Reiner were found dead at their home. President Trump, in a social media post, linked their deaths to Reiner's criticism of him, attributing it to "TRUMP DERANGEMENT SYNDROME." Their son has been arrested, but authorities have not confirmed a motive or any family involvement.

title: 'You are like Yuvraj Singh': Sooryavanshi compared to former India batter
content: Teenage sensation Vaibhav Sooryavanshi is gaining popularity, with young fans comparing him to Yuvraj Singh. Sooryavanshi is currently part of India‚Äôs Under-19 squad at the ACC Men‚Äôs Under-19 Asia Cup 2025. In the opening match of the tournament, he scored 171 runs against UAE and played a key role in India‚Äôs win.

title: ‚ÄòNo dead economy gets upgrades‚Äô: FM cites 8.2% growth to rebut Trump
content: Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman refuted claims of India being a "dead economy" in the Lok Sabha, citing strong growth figures and sovereign rating upgrades. She highlighted India's position as the fastest-growing major economy, with 8.2% growth in the September quarter, and emphasized the country's transition from fragility to fortitude.

title: Clean energy debate: Musk backs solar energy; Says we have free fusion reactor in sky
content: Elon Musk dismisses Earth-based fusion reactors as "super dumb," championing the Sun as the ultimate "free fusion reactor." He urges tech firms to cease funding "puny little reactors," advocating for solar energy instead. This stance contrasts with Silicon Valley's significant investments in nuclear fusion, with AI playing a crucial role in accelerating its development.

title: Pak-origin gunmen at Bondi: Intifada goes global - the West looks away
content: A Hanukkah celebration at Sydney's Bondi Beach was shattered by a massacre on December 14, 2025. A father and son, linked to extremist networks, opened fire, killing 16 and wounding dozens in a targeted antisemitic attack. This tragedy, Australia's deadliest mass shooting since 1996, highlights the global weaponization of anti-Israel slogans into violence and exposes the fragility of multicultural harmony.

title: Is Christian Watson playing Week 16 vs Bears? Latest Packers injury update
content: Christian Watson sustained a chest injury during the Packers' loss to the Broncos on December 15th after a hard fall on an interception. He was taken to a local hospital for further evaluation, raising concerns given his recent return from a torn ACL. Watson had been a key offensive weapon for Green Bay prior to this latest setback.

title: Nvidia responds to DeepSeek report; denies claims of ‚Äòbanned‚Äô chips behind Jan market rout
content: Nvidia has denied reports that Chinese AI startup DeepSeek is using smuggled Blackwell GPUs, calling the claims "far-fetched." The US has banned these advanced chips from export to China to maintain its AI lead. DeepSeek's previous AI model launch at a lower cost had already rattled US markets and sparked concerns about China's AI progress.

title: Connor McDavid reacts after Oilers trade Stuart Skinner and Brett Kulak
content: The Edmonton Oilers made a significant roster change, trading goalie Stuart Skinner and defenseman Brett Kulak to the Pittsburgh Penguins for Tristan Jarry and Spencer Stastney. While the move addressed goaltending needs, it was acknowledged as a difficult decision by players like Connor McDavid and Head Coach Kris Knoblauch, who praised the departing players' contributions.

title: BMC polls: Mahayuti eyes Mumbai but Pune flashpoint; Thackeray reunion shakes MVA
content: Maharashtra's long-pending civic body elections are finally scheduled for January 15, with results on January 16. The Brihanmumbai Municipal Corporation (BMC) polls are seen as a key political mood test, pitting the ruling Mahayuti alliance against a fractured opposition. Control of the BMC, Asia's wealthiest civic corporation, holds immense political and economic significance.

title: Watch: CM Nitish Kumar pulls down woman's hijab at event; Cong, RJD slam 'vile act'
content: Bihar Chief Minister Nitish Kumar removed the hijab of a woman AYUSH doctor during an appointment letter distribution event in Patna. The incident, captured on video, has sparked political criticism, with the Rashtriya Janata Dal accusing the CM of a "Sanghi" mindset. The doctor appeared visibly upset after the headscarf was removed.

title: Blake Lively calls Taylor Swift 'the dreamiest friend' amid Eras Tour buzz
content: Blake Lively celebrated a business venture amid reports of a strained friendship with Taylor Swift. Swift is reportedly "hurt" and feels used due to Lively's legal issues involving her "It Ends with Us" co-star. Lively's social media post focused on her haircare brand collaboration, pointedly avoiding any mention of Swift, highlighting a careful navigation of public perception and personal relationships.

title: Vanessa Bryant emotional as UConn, USC honour Kobe and Gigi in on-court tribute
content: The UConn Huskies beat the USC Trojans by 28 points. The game became emotional as players honored Kobe and Gigi Bryant. Both teams wore different Kobe sneakers. Vanessa Bryant shared pictures of the athletes on her Instagram. This tribute highlighted the lasting impact of Kobe and Gigi on basketball. Gigi had wished to play for UConn.

title: Where does Auston Matthews live? Inside Leafs star‚Äôs homes and lifestyle
content: Auston Matthews' net worth is estimated at $30 million in 2025, driven by his substantial NHL salary and lucrative endorsement deals with major brands like Nike and RBC. Beyond hockey, he has strategically invested in startups and actively supports men's health through philanthropy, showcasing a multi-faceted financial profile.

title: 'A dream and a duty': 'Fan' Sunil Chhetri reflects on meeting Messi
content: Indian football icon Sunil Chhetri experienced a fanboy moment meeting Lionel Messi in Mumbai, receiving a signed Argentina jersey. Chhetri expressed his joy and gratitude for the encounter, calling Messi's art an antidote to sadness. The Argentine star's tour also included a stop in Delhi, featuring exchanges with cricket officials.

title: Rekha's friend opens up on actress' emotional connection with Amitabh Bachchan
content: Rekha's friend Bina Ramani opened up on the actresss' deep emotional connection with Amitabh Bachchan, stating Rekha sought validation rather than secrecy. Ramani explained that Bachchan's marriage and political ambitions made public acknowledgment of their bond impossible, leaving Rekha heartbroken.

title: Toxic Capital: No offline classes for students till Class V; AQI stays above 400
content: Delhi schools are shifting students up to Class V to online learning due to severe air pollution, with the AQI reaching 498. Physical classes for younger children are suspended until further notice. Older students (Class VI and above) will continue with existing arrangements. Authorities advise precautions as pollution is expected to remain high.

title: Actor Shruhad Goswami shares experience of working with Smriti Irani
content: Acclaimed Gujarati actor Shruhad Goswami, famed for his role as Krishna in 'Laalo', made his Hindi television debut on 'Kyunki Saas Bhi Kabhi Bahu Thi 2'. The opportunity arose due to his film's success. Goswami shared his excitement about joining the iconic show and working with the warm and supportive Smriti Irani, calling the experience a dream come true.

title: Ditch supplement pills: Everyday foods that strengthen gut and immunity
content: Nourishing your gut is key to a robust immune system, experts reveal. Everyday foods like oats, yogurt, nuts and spices are powerful allies, far more effective than supplements. These staples feed beneficial bacteria, reduce inflammation and strengthen your body's natural defences, promoting overall wellbeing. Prioritise these wholesome choices for lasting health.

title: 'I quit without an offer': Indian employee lists 5 ways to exit a toxic job
content: An Indian software engineer resigned without a new offer due to a toxic work environment impacting mental health and growth. Recruiters often ask about this decision, and candidates can professionally explain it by focusing on cultural misalignment, acknowledging the gap directly, and shifting the conversation to future goals and long-term career development.

title: 'Waging war against India': NIA names Pak handler in Pahalgam case; chargesheet filed
content: The NIA has filed a chargesheet naming seven accused, including LeT and TRF, in the April 22 Pahalgam terror attack. The chargesheet identifies Pakistani handler Sajid Jatt and three slain Pakistani terrorists, along with two locals who harbored them. The attack resulted in the deaths of 26 civilians.

title: Watch: India displays Turkish drone used by Pak in Op Sindoor; was going to hit Jalandhar
content: The Indian Army displayed a Turkish-made Yiha kamikaze drone, shot down on May 10 during a conflict with Pakistan. Launched from Lahore with a 10-kg explosive payload, the drone was intended for Jalandhar but was intercepted by Army Air Defence. Pakistan deployed numerous such drones during the clashes.

title: 'Gracias Delhi': With promise to 'surely return', Messi concludes India tour
content: Lionel Messi concluded his GOAT India Tour in Delhi, a stark contrast to its chaotic Kolkata start. Fans at Arun Jaitley Stadium cheered as the football icon expressed gratitude for the overwhelming affection shown during his brief but memorable visit. Messi promised a return, leaving a lasting impression on his admirers.

title: Axar ruled out of T20I series vs SA; Shahbaz Ahmed named replacement
content: Allrounder Axar Patel has been ruled out of the remaining T20Is against South Africa due to illness and will be replaced by Shahbaz Ahmed. Patel missed the third T20I, where India's bowlers performed exceptionally well to restrict South Africa to 117. The updated squad for the final two matches has been announced.

title: J&K encounter under way: Terrorists trapped; heavy firing reported
content: Security forces have established contact with terrorists in the Majalta area of Udhampur district, Jammu and Kashmir. The encounter began after a cordon-and-search operation, with intermittent firing reported. Reinforcements have been deployed, and escape routes are blocked.

title: What is Australia's Skills in Demand visa all about? Check who can apply & other details
content: Australia‚Äôs Skills in Demand visa allows employers to sponsor overseas workers when suitable local candidates are unavailable. Managed by the Department of Home Affairs, the temporary work visa includes Core Skills, Specialist Skills, Labour Agreement, and Subsequent Entrant streams. Employers must meet nomination, skills, English language, and income threshold requirements. Visa stays range up to four years, with extended eligibility for Hong Kong passport holders.

title: Pak national, unemployed: What we know about Bondi beach shooters ‚Äî key findings
content: Tragedy struck Bondi Beach as a father-son duo unleashed gunfire at a Hanukkah event, claiming at least 15 lives. The attackers, identified as Sajid and Naveed Akram, opened fire from a footbridge. Police neutralised Sajid, while Naveed was apprehended. Investigations are underway, with possible links to extremist groups being explored.

title: Samantha Ruth Prabhu praises 'Dhurandhar'; lauds performance of Akshay & Ranveer
content: Samantha Ruth Prabhu is raving about the recently released film 'Dhurandhar', calling it a "big screen experience" that left her "buzzing." She lauded Ranveer Singh's "unreal" performance and praised the entire cast and director Aditya Dhar for a "stunning" cinematic achievement. The film is also making waves at the box office.

title: New study reveals surprising effects for those who took the Covid-19 vaccine
content: A recent large-scale study has produced results that may challenge assumptions on Covid-19 vaccination. Examining health outcomes across millions of adults, the research highlights patterns that go beyond immediate infection prevention. The findings raise intriguing questions about the broader impact of vaccination, offering insight for both supporters and skeptics alike.

title: Why from Bihar & why now? Nitin Nabin takes charge as BJP working prez; big signal by party
content: Nitin Nabin, a 45-year-old Bihar minister, has been appointed BJP's working president, positioning him to become the youngest national president. His selection, seen as a strategic move by Prime Minister Modi and Amit Shah, signals a generational shift within the party. Nabin's five-term MLA experience and organizational skills have been highlighted as key factors in his rapid ascent.

title: TJ Watt injury update: Will Steelers LB play today vs Dolphins?
content: T.J. Watt has been ruled out for the Pittsburgh Steelers' Week 15 game against the Miami Dolphins due to a partially collapsed lung. The star linebacker underwent a successful medical procedure and is resting at home, but his return timeline remains uncertain. His absence creates a significant void for the Steelers' defense, which has struggled in games he has missed.

title: Viksit Bharat Adhishthan Bill: Rs 2cr fine for illegal universities
content: The Cabinet-approved Viksit Bharat Adhishthan Bill proposes a ‚Çπ2-crore penalty and immediate shutdown for unapproved universities. But while the law sharpens punishment for institutions, it leaves students exposed. This explainer decodes what happens to degrees when universities are shut, what current law says ‚Äî and why students must verify recognition before admission.

title: Connor McDavid‚Äôs wife, Lauren Kyle launches Sports Club Atelier collection
content: Lauren Kyle, wife of NHL star Connor McDavid, is launching a Canada-inspired collection for her brand, Sports Club Atelier, in January. Drawing inspiration from vintage winter advertising and alpine campaigns, the line features red-and-white pieces designed for fans to express patriotic pride fashionably at sporting events and in everyday life.

title: From tech city to tanker city: Inside Bengaluru‚Äôs deepening water crisis
content: Bengaluru's water crisis deepens as residents rely on state-run tankers, a temporary fix for a failing system. Decades of neglect have decimated ancient lake networks, leaving the city dependent on costly, unreliable water sources. This reliance on tankers, while offering immediate relief, masks a critical need for long-term solutions to prevent a future water emergency.

title: MGNREGA renaming row: Cong claims conspiracy; what new scheme proposes
content: Opposition leaders have strongly criticized the Centre's move to repeal and replace the MGNREGA, questioning the removal of Mahatma Gandhi's name. Critics allege a conspiracy to dismantle a rights-based law, calling the renaming hypocritical and an insult to the Father of the Nation. The proposed bill aims to revamp rural employment with a new framework.

title: Bukayo Saka & Tolami Benson net worth 2025: Earnings, brands, lifestyle
content: Arsenal star Bukayo Saka is a financial powerhouse, with his net worth projected around $30 million by 2025, fueled by his lucrative club contract and major endorsement deals. His partner, Tolami Benson, also boasts an independent career in public relations and investments, contributing to their combined financial standing. Saka's marketability continues to soar.

title: PM Modi in Jordan: To hold talks with King Abdullah II; what's at stake
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi commenced a three-nation tour in Jordan, marking 75 years of diplomatic ties. He will then visit Ethiopia, a key African Union hub, to bolster bilateral relations and address Parliament. The tour concludes in Oman, aiming to deepen their strategic partnership and economic ties, with engagements including diaspora meetings.

title: 'If he does not perform': Ashwin issues blunt review as Gill struggles in T20Is
content: Shubman Gill's recent batting struggles have put India's T20 World Cup plans in a bind. With only seven T20Is left, the vice-captain's form is under scrutiny, intensifying debate over Sanju Samson's potential inclusion. Former spinner Ravichandran Ashwin urges a fair review, highlighting the difficulty of dropping a vice-captain while stressing the need for impactful batting.

title: Rupee sinks further, hits new all-time low of 90.74 vs dollar
content: The Indian rupee hit a fresh all-time low of 90.74 against the US dollar, pressured by uncertainty over an India-US trade deal and continued foreign fund outflows. Despite positive macro cues, the rupee struggled as importers' strong dollar demand and risk-averse sentiment dominated. Experts see a bullish near-term bias for the USD-INR pair.

title: IPL Auction: Green to Nortje - 10 players who could spark bidding wars
content: A total of 350 cricketers, including 240 Indians, are set for the IPL auction in Abu Dhabi on December 16. Franchises will bid for 77 slots, with top players like Cameron Green and David Miller attracting Rs 2 crore base prices. Teams are actively seeking overseas all-rounders and pace options to finalize squads for the upcoming season.

title: Omar Abdullah Seeks Probe Into Coercion Allegations At Ratle Power Plant
content: Jammu and Kashmir Chief Minister Omar Abdullah has demanded a probe against two BJP MLAs after a Hyderabad-based infrastructure company alleged interference and extortion in connection with the Rs 3,700 crore Ratle hydropower project in J&K.

title: Man Fakes Death By Setting Another Ablaze, Texts To Girlfriend Expose Him
content: He murdered a hapless hitchhiker to fake his own death and even let his family grieve over him, only to be undone by a series of messages to his girlfriend

title: 19-Year-Old Rapido Driver Robs, Molests Woman Near Mumbai, Arrested
content: A Rapido bike taxi rider was arrested in Kalyan in Thane district for allegedly molesting a 26-year-old woman passenger and stealing Rs 1000 from her, a police official said on Monday.

title: Sikkim Opens Cho La, Dok La At India-China Border For Battlefield Tourism
content: The strategic Cho La and Dok La passes at the India-China border were opened under the battlefield tourism initiative on Monday.

title: Chemicals, Equipment Worth Rs 100 Crore Seized At Drug Factory In Rajasthan
content: The Maharashtra police's Anti-Narcotics Cell has unearthed an MD drug manufacturing factory in Jhunjhunu, Rajasthan, and seized the contraband, chemicals and equipment valued at around Rs 100 crore, officials said on Monday.

title: "India A Preferred Place For Data Centres, No Shortage Of Power": Piyush Goyal
content: Union Minister Piyush Goyal on Monday said India is a preferred destination for data centres as the country has no dearth of electricity and its 500GW national grid can take care of surge in demand.

title: "Chaos Everywhere": Player Dead After Shooting At Punjab Kabaddi Match
content: A shooting incident occurred at the Bedwan Sports Club's four-day kabaddi match in Mohali, leaving promoter Rana BalaChouria seriously injured.

title: PM Modi Arrives In Jordan, Holds Talks With King Abdullah II
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Monday said his visit to Jordan will boost bilateral linkages between the two nations, as he arrived in Amman on the first leg of his three-nation trip aimed at further strengthening ties with them.

title: Old Horror Haunts Madhya Pradesh Again: Rats Jump Over Patients In Hospitals
content: The menace of rats in government hospitals across Madhya Pradesh is fast turning into a public health nightmare. After shocking incidents from Indore's Maharaja Yeshwantrao Hospital and Netaji Subhash Chandra Bose Medical College in Jabalpur.

title: Newborn's Charred Body Found Hours After Blaze In Madhya Pradesh Hospital
content: Panic and outrage gripped Sanjay Gandhi Hospital in Rewa after the partially burnt body of a newborn was discovered during the cleaning of the operation theatre (OT) in the gynaecology ward, hours after a fire incident.

title: As Centre Plans MGNREGA Makeover, States Still Owed Rs 9,700 Crore
content: As the Centre moves to replace the Mahatma Gandhi National Rural Employment Guarantee Scheme (MGNREGA), states are still owed over Rs 9,700 crore under it.

title: "Avoid My-State-My-State Attitude": Top Court Raps Tamil Nadu On Language Policy
content: Tamil Nadu should engage the Centre on its demand for the retention of its two-language policy and not air its views on media, the Supreme Court said today while hearing a case an allocation of land for new Central schools.

title: ED Attaches Assets Worth Rs 5.41 Crore Over Illegal Immigration To US
content: The Enforcement Directorate has provisionally attached assets worth approximately Rs 5.41 crore in connection with an illegal immigration racket where people were sent illegally to the US through the hazardous "dunky" route.

title: India Dismisses Trump's Accusation Of 'Dumping' Rice In US
content: India rejected on Monday US accusations that it is "dumping" rice in the United States, saying its rice exports are primarily premium-grade basmati, which typically commands higher prices than non-basmati varieties.

title: Pakistan Terrorist Who Heads Lashkar Offshoot Named Pahalgam Attack Mastermind
content: Pakistan's involvement in the Pahalgam terror attack has been exposed, with the National Investigation Agency (NIA) naming Sajid Saifullah Jutt, a Pakistani national, as the main conspirator behind the terror attack that killed 26 tourists.

title: Nitish Kumar Pulls Down Doctor's Hijab, Opposition Questions Mental State
content: Opening himself up to more questions about his mental health a month after taking oath as the Bihar chief minister for the 10th time, Nitish Kumar has pulled a hijab down from a woman's face during a government event in Patna.

title: Tractor With Illegally Mined Sand Rams Madhya Pradesh Official's Vehicle
content: The reign of terror unleashed by the sand mafia in Madhya Pradesh's Bhind district surfaced once again on Monday, exposing the extent to which illegal miners have grown fearless of the law.

title: Online Classes For Nursery To Class 5 In Delhi Schools Amid Severe Pollution
content: Students from nursery to Class 5 will have to study in virtual mode compulsorily due to rising air pollution, the Delhi government said today.

title: Toxic Winter: Delhi's AQI Breaches 460, NCR Cities Gasp For Air
content: A thick toxic haze blanketed Delhi today morning, reducing visibility and disrupting flights and train schedules as the capital battled hazardous air quality.

title: 'Let's Not Dishonour Mahatma's Legacy': Shashi Tharoor On Renaming MGNREGA
content: The political battle over the renaming of the flagship MNREGA to "G Ram G" is "unfortunate", said senior Congress leader Shashi Tharoor, in a deviation from his party line that is expected to further expand the rift between them.

title: College football bowl season: MVPs for the first two bowl games of the season
content: south Carolina State beat Prairie View A&M 40‚Äì38 with a two-point conversion . it's one of the most exciting times of the year as the 2025 bowl season is underway . college football experts provide their MVP picks for each of the 36 bowl games this season .

title: Best fits for transfer quarterback DJ Lagway: Five schools that make the most sense
content: DJ Lagway is the top-rated quarterback in the 2024 ESPN 300 . he's coming off a 4-8 season in which he threw 14 interceptions and ranked 14th in the conference in QBR (59.5) but there's still a market for his talents if the 19-game starter can find the right situation and stay healthy .

title: Winners and losers: Henderson, Lawrence paint playoff masterpiece
content: t reVeyon Henderson scored 30.1 fantasy points, had a pair of 50-plus yard touchdowns on which he was clocked at faster than 20 mph on each . in Week 10, he scored 28.0 fantasy points and ran for 105 more yards than expected .

title: Free agent pickups: What can you do to replace Patrick Mahomes?
content: the 15th Sunday of the season featured several notable comebacks . a pair of season-ending knee injuries may define this week for both the short and long term . the qbs ranked second among all qBs in week 15 .

title: The NHL's best this week: Get set for the next round of the Battle of Florida
content: the next installment of the Battle of Florida will be contested between the Tampa Bay Lightning and Florida Panthers . the two teams entered the league one year apart, including the Bolts in 1992 and the Cats a year later . but the rivalry was purely geographical, with the hockey world largely focusing on other feuds or thriving franchises.

title: NBA buzz: Live updates, trades and intel from around the league
content: the 2025-26 season has reached the quarter mark, and buzz around the league is beginning to heat up . the trade season expanding on Dec. 15 was a primary topic on the Hoop Collective podcast . "it coincides with the point in the season where teams start to make some decisions about the ineptitude or ... some of the weaknesses of their roster," Windhorst said .

title: MLB offseason grades: Phillies add OF Garcia, D-backs reunite with Kelly
content: the 2025-26 offseason is officially here, and we have you covered with grades and analysis for every major signing and trade this winter . the deal: one year, $10 million Grade: D The Philadelphia Phillies have been seeking an upgrade on Nick Castellanos in right field for a couple of years .

title: Has Lawrence leveled up? Pats-Bills rematch? Let's overreact to Week 15
content: the playoffs will be Chiefs-free for the first time in 11 years . it means the AFC Championship Game will be contested without the Chiefs . the playoff game will be held without the chiefs for a second time in eight years, it's not an overreaction .

title: Big questions from Week 15 games: Can the Rams take the 1-seed? What now for the Chiefs?
content: quarterback Patrick Mahomes left the Chiefs' loss late in the fourth quarter with a knee injury . the quarterbacks denied the Patriots a chance to clinch the AFC East title . texans and Jaguars also scored 40-plus points in dominant victories .

title: Ranking all 64 teams in College Football Playoff history
content: the new era of college football features a larger College Football Playoff and a lower bar for inclusion . the transfer portal and increased freedom of movement for players have meant that today's best teams can't stockpile awesome backups as easily as they could in the past .
